subject: College Athletics
lead_paragraph: All 16 Big East Conference members will play in its postseason men’s and women’s tournaments beginning in 2009. Four members have been left out since the league expanded in 2005-6. A day will be added to the tournaments. Teams seeded 9 through 16 will meet on the first day. The winners will advance to play seeds 5 through 8. The four highest-seeded teams will still receive a bye to the quarterfinals, where they will meet the winners of the second day’s games.
